name: stackspin
description: Stackspin is a self-hosted Kubernetes-based platform for deploying curated open-source applications. It provides tooling and configuration for running a managed app stack.

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Deploys curated open-source apps on Kubernetes clusters

features.title: App Catalog
features.description: Provides pre-configured applications ready for deployment

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Backs up application data automatically to configured storage

features.title: Ssl Management
features.description: Handles SSL certificates automatically with cert-manager
